text: @NikkiHaley You are piece of garbage for a human being & disgusting. The state did not cause this pandemic. Maybe if your Lord Trump taken action quicker in Feb the states will not be in this situation. Close to 50k Americans would not be dead & over 850k will not test postive for #COVID19 .
